com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap

Interface FormatLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLDAPMojo, DumpMojo, LoadMojo

    public interface FormatLogger
    The API used by FormatHandler, FormatReader and FormatWriter implementations to log information and error messages.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logError(String message)
      Write an error message to the log file.
      void logError(String message, Throwable exception)
      Write an error message with an exception stack trace to the log file.
      void logInfo(String message)
      Write an information message to the log file.

    • Method Detail

        Write an error message to the log file.

      • logError

        exception - The exception.
